item.title: Immigration primer
item.description: The left and the globalist right have both failed to put forward the positive case for immigration, and Brexit is arguably the result. This document is intended to equip you for making that case by giving you a quick overview of the economic effects of immigration, according to the best evidence we have, and by clearly articulating plausible reasons for the effects we see.
